name: Ask a Robot
tagline: Got a question that you want answered? Ask a Robot. Free advice and fun for all!
body:
Got a question that you want answered? Ask a Robot.
Free fortune telling and advice from a movie and pop culture loving Robot.
Don't be surprise if your answers contain movie quotes and pop culture references.

Features
- Simple Magic 8-ball Mode
- Advance Mode with smarter answers
- Song and Movie Easter Eggs

Download this FREE App today!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
